name: Shadow Strike: Street Combat
description:
Welcome to the adrenaline-charged world of "Shadow Strike: Street Combat" on the Steam platform! Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding action of this 3D side-scrolling fighting game, where every move counts and every street corner holds a new challenge. Set against the gritty backdrop of an urban landscape, your journey through the mean streets will push your combat skills to the limit.

Key Features:

1. Intense 3D Side-Scrolling Combat:


Engage in dynamic, visually stunning battles that bring the streets to life. Experience the thrill of 3D side-scrolling combat like never before as you face off against formidable opponents in a quest for supremacy.

2. Urban Warfare:


Navigate through realistic urban environments. Meticulously designed to provide a unique and challenging combat experience, ensuring that each showdown is different from the last.

3. Perspectacles Head Tracking Integration:


Immerse yourself even deeper in the gritty urban combat with seamless integration for Perspectacles head tracking glasses. While the game features side-scrolling action, Perspectacles enhances the visual experience by providing a heightened sense of depth and perspective. Feel the pulse of the city streets as you move your head, allowing for a more immersive and engaging environment. While the traditional side-scrolling format remains, Perspectacles enriches the visual experience, bringing the urban chaos to life in a way that goes beyond conventional gaming visuals.

4. Dynamic Combat System:


Master a diverse range of combat techniques, from hand-to-hand brawling to adrenaline-pumping special moves. String together combos and perfect your timing to unleash devastating attacks, leaving your opponents in awe of your martial prowess.

5. Customization and Progression:


Choose your fighter with a variety of outfits, and abilities.

Gear up, step into the shadows, and prepare for an unparalleled gaming experience in "Shadow Strike: Street Combat." The streets are unforgiving, but with your skills and the immersive power of Perspectacles, victory is within reach. Are you ready to dominate the urban battleground?
